Package View.Animations

Class RotatingAnimation

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
View.Animations.Animation
View.Animations.RotatingAnimation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class RotatingAnimation extends Animation
Class used to draw an image rotating on its center. Used to permanently draw the direction of the turn. Specialize the abstract class Animation
Author:
Luigi D'Annibale, Daniele Venturini

  • Constructor Details

    • RotatingAnimation

      public RotatingAnimation(String path, int x, int y)
      Creates a new RotatingAnimation with the path of the image to draw at the given x and y. It scales the image with the scaling percentage. If the image is not found then the Animation doesn't start
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the image to draw
      x -
      y -

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Adds to the degree of the image the related increment. If the degrees are becoming big numbers, they are resetted
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Specified by:
      run in class Animation

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn(boolean clockwise)
      Rotates how the image is drawn by 180 degrees based on the direction of the turn
      Parameters:
      clockwise - true if the turn is clockwise, false otherwise
